top_matches.title: [ImportVerilog] Cannot compile forward decleared string type
top_matches.summary: Reports same root cause: MooreToCore lacks string-type conversion, causing moore.variable to fail for string type. Same underlying issue - missing type converter for moore::StringType.

top_matches.title: [MooreToCore] Support for StringType from moore to llvm dialect
top_matches.summary: Feature discussion about adding StringType support to MooreToCore. Related but this is a feature request/discussion, not a bug report for the crash.

top_matches.title: [MooreToCore] Crash with sqrt/floor
top_matches.summary: Same assertion message 'dyn_cast on a non-existent value' in MooreToCore, but caused by real type conversion (sqrt/floor), not string type. Different trigger but similar underlying mechanism.

top_matches.title: [MooreToCore] VariableOp lowered failed
top_matches.summary: MooreToCore crash when casting hw::InOutType for struct type. Related type conversion issue but for struct type, not string type.

top_matches.title: [MooreToCore] Lowering to math.ipow?
top_matches.summary: Discussion about lowering PowUOp in MooreToCore. Unrelated to string type issue.

analysis_notes: Issue #8283 directly describes the same problem: MooreToCore lacks string-type conversion causing moore.variable to fail. The test case in #8283 uses string as a local variable, while our crash uses string as a module port, but the root cause is identical - missing type converter for moore::StringType. This should be considered a duplicate or very closely related issue.
